to the best of your knowledge,

don't land

Hooray for women's lib.

Taxi, madam?
Yeah.
[man] Next, please.
-[man] Thank you. -[church bells ringing distortedly]
[man] Thank you.

Miss! Hey.

Dick McMahon.

translation.en: "Treat Austin Morrison, ambassador-at-large,
BA, University of California, Berkeley.

Married.
Treat Austin Morrison, only son, and after his sister's suicide,

Widower.

-[eating] He's aiming for one out of 435. -Very good.

Nothing missed.

Hotel?

Ramada. Ramada.

Fresh cut coco!
Coco!
[woman] Name tag?

Happy Fourth of July.
Happy Fourth of July.

translation.en: No record of departing the States, brief stay at a hotel in San José,

Fascinating.

All right.
